segments.text: Simon , may I introduce you to Linda ? You don ’ t know each other , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I ’ Ve not had the pleasure of meeting her yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you do ? I ’ m pleased to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please sit down . Help yourself just like you are at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you like to drink ?
segments.speaker: S2
